summary: Completed testing of GitHub integration for Webcrafters Studio. Found critical issues with both backend API routing and frontend component rendering.

critical_bugs.issue: All GitHub API endpoints return 405 Method Not Allowed when accessed via external URL
critical_bugs.impact: Blocks all GitHub functionality including OAuth and import features
critical_bugs.details: Internal backend (localhost:8001) works correctly returning 401 Unauthorized as expected, but external routing through Kubernetes ingress fails with 405 errors

working_endpoints.note: Backend GitHub routes are properly implemented and functional internally

ui_bugs.issue: GitHub login button is completely missing from login page
ui_bugs.details: No GitHub-related content found in page source despite being present in Login.jsx code

ui_bugs.issue: GitHub Import quick action card not rendering
ui_bugs.details: Only 3 of 4 quick action cards render: AI Generator, Templates, Analytics. Import GitHub card missing despite being in code

integration_issues.issue: Cannot test OAuth flow due to missing login button
Cannot access import modal due to missing dashboard button

passed_tests: Backend GitHub API endpoints work internally
GitHub service and router code is properly implemented
No JavaScript console errors on frontend

critical_issues: Fix Kubernetes ingress routing for GitHub API endpoints (/api/github/*)
Investigate why GitHub components are not rendering in Login and Dashboard pages
Verify GitHub component imports and dependencies in frontend build
investigation_needed: Check if GitHubImportModal component has import/dependency issues
Verify if there are conditional rendering logic preventing GitHub features
Review Kubernetes ingress configuration for GitHub API routes

success_percentage.backend: 50% (API code works internally, external routing fails)
success_percentage.frontend: 25% (Components exist but don't render, basic UI works)
